About Us

Our Story

Nù-tree's adventure began with a late-night conversation during the COVID-19 shutdown with my brother about how certain brands deceive innocent people by making bogus health claims. How large fruit juice brands use preserved fruit concentrates instead of real fruits mixed with water, added sugars, preservatives, and even thickening agents to bring aesthetics to their junk food and promote it as "healthy"; how parents are tricked into purchasing healthy drinks for their children that have namesake nutritional values but are actually laden with sorbent amounts of unhealthy sugars.

Then came the simple realization that, even if people did want to drink healthy juices, there weren't many guilt-free options available. Even the neighborhood juice stand, where people go after work or gym or on a hot summer afternoon, was forcing people to buy juices that contained harmful bacteria, powdered sugar, masalas, and even contaminated ice. This is effectively destroying the concept of a healthy drink. This forced us to consider creating a healthy business that is also viable by offering reasonably priced smoothie bowls, smoothie drinks, juices, and better alternatives for tea and coffee.

Originally envisioned as the first QSR cafe in India, Nú-tree was built on the principles of promoting nutritious drinks that can serve as a full meal by selecting only seasonal fruits and vegetables, micronutrient-rich nuts and seeds, and incorporating superfoods like spirulina, matcha, blue tea, and coffee into Indians' daily diets. According to the World Health Organization, over 50% of Indians do not regularly consume a balanced diet that contains all the necessary macro and micronutrients, making the country the world's capital of diabetes, obesity, and malnutrition.

Thus, Nú-tree smoothie café aims to provide novel tastes and combinations to Indians, bringing about a shift in lifestyle by procuring fruits from all over the world.
